name: Katira's Tower
description:
Katira's Tower is an action adventure game where you try to defeat the boss, Katira, and break the cycle of being sent to the start of the tower!

A mage, Maherine, got herself cursed to this Tower, and the only way she can break the cycle is to defeat the Demoness, Katira!

This game uses a card-based timed battle system, where you must play and discard cards in time to attack! Enemies will drop cards for you to use in battle. When you fall, instead of losing, you will be sent to the start of the tower!
